info.name: iBankPay Api Sandbox Scenarios copy
info.description: This collections includes all i-Bank Pay Sandbox Api endpoints and their tests

item.name: RegisterSanboxPos
item.description:
This scenario:
1. registers a device with DeviceClass = SandboxPos
2. checks it's status

{
  "header": {

     "channel":"{{body.header.channel}}"
    },
  "Payload": {
    "userId": "{{IBankPayUser3.id}}",
    "actualUserId": "{{IBankPayUser3.id}}",
    "member": {
      "memberId": "{{IBankPayUser3.memberId}}",
      "contactId": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
      "firstName": "string",
      "surName": "string",

      "title": "string",
      "registries": [
        {
          "name": "string",
          "isPrimary": true,
          "description": "string"
        }
      ],
      "status": "Pending",
      "verificationCode": "string",

          "matched": true,
          "nickName": "string",
          "preferredAccount": "string",
